title: Topic 003 Question 061
body: You have an Azure subscription. The subscription contains a storage account named storage1 that has the lifecycle management rules shown in the following table.
On June 1, you store a blob named File1 in the Hot access tier of storage1.
What is the state of File1 on June 7?
options: stored in the Cool access tier
stored in the Archive access tier
stored in the Hot access tier
